item.title: Tela add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Tela add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Tela add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "It is what you read when you don't have to that determines what you will be when you can't help it." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Tela add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "All God does is watch us and kill us when we get boring. We must never, ever be boring." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Tela add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "Today is the sort of day where the sun only comes up to humiliate you." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Tela add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "Hysteria is impossible without an audience. Panicking by yourself is the same as laughing alone in an empty room. You feel really silly." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Tela add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "That's why I write, because life never works except in retrospect. You can't control life, at least you can control your version." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Tela add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
Tela add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "Just for the record, the weather today is calm and sunny, but the air is full of bullshit." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Tela add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "So maybe I'll spend some years in prison, but you'll have a big head start on me in hell!" -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Tela add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "If you love something set it free, but don't be surprised if it comes back with herpes." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Tela add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "Leonardo's Mona Lisa is just a thousand thousand smears of paint. Michelangelo's David is just a million hits with a hammer. We're all of us a million bits put together the right way." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Tela add a quote by Mark Z. Danielewski
item.description: "Sublime is something you choke on after a shot of tequila." -- Mark Z. Danielewski

item.title: Tela add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "There are no good girls gone wrong - just bad girls found out." -- Mae West

item.title: Tela add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "When I'm good, I'm very good, but when I'm bad, I'm better. " -- Mae West

item.title: Tela add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "I made myself platinum, but I was born a dirty blonde." -- Mae West

item.title: Tela add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "Human relationships didn't work anyhow. Only the first two weeks had any zing, then the participants lost their interest. Masks dropped away and real people began to appear: cranks, imbeciles, the demented, the vengeful, sadists, killers. Modern society had created its own kind and they feasted on each other. It was a duel to the death--in a cesspool." -- Charles Bukowski
